name: tinge
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a very slight amount of a colour or of a feeling: His hair is starting to show tinges of grey. I felt a tinge of regret that I hadn't accepted her offer.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Feelings - general words
to contain a slight amount of: Her joy at the birth of her son was tinged with sadness that her father had not lived to see him.
